name: Earth Protector (M77mdsD)
description:
Hey!

You want to be the new earth protector?

its so easy just download the game (you can donate if you want).

How to Play:

  • Block the normal rocks with your shield.
  • Fire a awesome lasser in the protected rocks to destroy and back to normal.
  • After 5 levels you will face the great rock.
  • Kill it to win the game!

Game Features:

  • Player move up and down only.
  • Shield to protect the earth and the player.
  • Player can fire lesser (after the first level) that destory some rocks.
  • Normal rock and protected rock.
  • End game boss.
  • Infinity mode (after destroy the boss).
